title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description:
Description: The default value set in the list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Observed Behavior:
The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.

Expected Behavior:
The default value set in the list box of the report parameter should be retained after modifying the default value.

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a report parameter and set the Display Type to List Box.
2. Input three values: "aa", "bb", "cc" and set "aa" as the default value, then click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog box and modify the default value from "aa" to "aaa", then click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog box.
5. [ENTER ADDITIONAL INFORMATION HERE]
